
// Two attempts to reproduce the main counter-rotating lights used for most
// of the conversation sequence. These are single patterns, not overlaid.
// Still working on getting these just right.

#define ZIGZAG_SLIT_WIDTH 34

// These two patterns, when combined together, create a particularly
// nice and interesting pattern. 

#define ZIGZAG_SLIT_WIDTH 44
